events.message: I received my new wireless headphones today but noticed a large scratch on the left earcup, which wasn't mentioned anywhere in the product description.
System has classified the customer's issue under Product Defect due to keywords like 'scratch' and 'damage' in the complaint.
The case has been assigned to Agent Sarah L. who specializes in product issues and returns.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I'm sorry to hear about the scratch on your headphones. Let's get this sorted for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the scratch and confirm if the packaging was damaged upon delivery?
I have attached several photos showing the scratch clearly. The packaging looked fine when I opened it, so I think the damage happened before shipment.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit immediately or a full refund if you prefer. Please let me know which option suits you best.
I appreciate the quick response. I would like the replacement unit sent out as soon as possible, please.
We have processed your replacement order and sent it via expedited shipping. You will receive a tracking number shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that your replacement headphones arrived in perfect condition and that youâ€™re satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, the replacement headphones arrived yesterday and are in excellent condition. Thank you for the excellent support!
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our services.
The customer completed the satisfaction survey with high ratings and positive comments about the quick service and solution.
The support case has been formally closed following confirmation of issue resolution and customer satisfaction.
The case record was archived automatically after the standard retention period, ensuring compliance with data policies.
